quiz.text: Recently in November 2022, Canara Bank in partnership with National E-Governance Services Limited (NeSL) has launched Electronic Bank Guarantee (e-BG). Which of the following statements best define ‘Bank Guarantee’?

The bank guarantee means that the debtor will ensure that the liabilities of a lender will be met.

The bank guarantee means that the RBI will ensure that the liabilities of a lender will be met.
None of the above
